DOC.brief_title: Quality Chest Compressions After Night Shift
DOC.detailed_description: This non inferiority cluster randomize trial three Emergency Departments ( ED ) five Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) three urban academic hospital Paris , France . The investigator evaluate quality CC low-fidelity manikin electronic feedback device . The investigator test subject 6-minutes CC-only CPR scenario , include 2 minute pause . Physicians test either control day night shift , night shift control day .
